item.title: By: Drey

item.description: I just sent you a Netflix invite!
item.content:encoded: I just sent you a Netflix invite!

item.title: By: Smarty
item.dc:creator: Smarty
item.description: I just got what I hope is an excellent samurai movie from Netflix today. We should be Netflix friends. :D
item.content:encoded: I just got what I hope is an excellent samurai movie from Netflix today. We should be Netflix friends. ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: That's one I haven't seen. I need to update my Netflix with all the other Miyazaki movies I haven't seen.
item.content:encoded: That’s one I haven’t seen. I need to update my Netflix with all the other Miyazaki movies I haven’t seen.

item.title: By: Smarty
item.dc:creator: Smarty
item.description: I don't think I'll ever forget Phil Hartman as Kiki's cat in Kiki's Delivery Service. My sister and I quote him all the time. "Kiki!"
item.content:encoded: I don’t think I’ll ever forget Phil Hartman as Kiki’s cat in Kiki’s Delivery Service. My sister and I quote him all the time. “Kiki!”

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I usually turn on the subtitles and the dub so I can compare. I usually switch over to the subs. But the voice acting was really great in this one. So far, Disney has handled the films pretty well.
item.content:encoded: I usually turn on the subtitles and the dub so I can compare. I usually switch over to the subs. But the voice acting was really great in this one. So far, Disney has handled the films pretty well.

item.title: By: Smarty
item.dc:creator: Smarty
item.description:
I hate watching dubbed things - even animation. I would much rather watch in the original language with the subtitles.
That said, I do love Miyazaki!
item.content:encoded:
I hate watching dubbed things – even animation. I would much rather watch in the original language with the subtitles.

That said, I do love Miyazaki!
